column4: and chong: you're wrong. sarge has 2.6.8. you just type linux26 at boot in the install CD
i'm starting a flame? i'm just saying debian is a fine distro. and it better be since all of ubuntu is based on debian and universe is made up of untouched debian packages
uhm.. sorry, my autocomplete got me again.. i was talking to Jammie back there :P
